text: allh wahdah hu aladhi khalaq sabe smwat, wakhalaq sbeana min alaradyn, wa'anzal al'amr mimaa awhah allah 'iilaa rusulah wama ydbbir bih khalaqah bayn alsmwat walard; ltelmu- 'ayuha alnas- 'ana allah ealaa kuli shay' qadir la yejzh shy', wa'ana allah qad 'ahat bikuli shay' elmana, fala yakhruj shay' ean ealamah wqdrth
